qualifyze.description: I'm part of a big product oriented team in a fast-growing company related to the pharmaceutical sector, home to the largest database of quality compliance data in the world.

seatCode.description: At SEAT:CODE, I was working in a small team for a gamification solution for Audi aimed at reducing battery waste and improving user satisfaction with their vehicle.

uniboNeobank.description: Collaborated in a really small, dynamic fintech product team. My primary focus was on designing and implementing robust, scalable microservices and solutions that catered to the needs of the company. I actively participated in the creation of a rich domain model and contributed to product development efforts.

bizAway.description: Worked at an international B2B startup from Italy that streamlined business travel bookings. I developed and maintained core product services, libraries and frameworks and worked in a small product oriented team.

galvintec.description: Working as a full-stack developer in an e-commerce platform that we were building from scratch. My main responsibility was to develop the product's catalog microservice.
